fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Perform magic on a player during the night, enveloping them in florae.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Players enveloped in Florae are unable to perform Night abilities.
If all Good members are enveloped in Florae, they all die immediately and you leave the village in victory, if all Good die regularly, you do not leave.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Good faction lose the game.
